scripts.postgres:dump:scalingo: docker exec -i 1j1s-cms_db_1 /bin/bash -c "PGPASSWORD=1front1cms pg_dump --username admin-1j1s-cms --column-inserts -a -T admin_permissions -T admin_permissions_role_links -T strapi_core_store_settings -T admin_users -T admin_roles -T admin_users_roles_links -T i18n_locale -T strapi_api_tokens -T strapi_database_schema -T up_permissions -T up_roles -T up_permissions_role_links 1j1s-cms" > dumpforscalingo.sql
scripts.postgres:kill: docker stop 1j1s-cms_db_1 || true && docker rm 1j1s-cms_db_1 || true
scripts.postgres:seed: cat dump.sql | docker exec -i 1j1s-cms_db_1 psql -U admin-1j1s-cms 1j1s-cms
scripts.postgres:rebuild: npm run postgres:kill && npm run postgres:up && npm run postgres:seed
